description:
Fist was plotting to take in Ordela`s powers and take over this world to make it the new home for the Mecha-Udes. During the battle, Hikaru tries to protect Alma from Fist`s attack and ends up close to dying. Kagami then thinks up a plan to save Hikaru.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: こんな所で止まんなよ!
